q_en: List the progress percentage of all sewing groups
gt:
Sure! Here's the progress percentage of all sewing groups, presented in a neat table for you. üòä

| Sewing Group      | Progress Percentage (%) |
|-------------------|-------------------------|
| Master Sewers     | 97.44                   |
| Skilled Sewers    | 97.22                   |
| Advanced Sewers   | 81.96                   |
| Premier Sewers    | 74.67                   |
| Elite Sewers      | 44.07                   |

Keep up the great work, sewing teams! üßµ‚ú®

steps.sql: SELECT working_group_id, SUM(completed_number) AS total_completed FROM sewing_tasks GROUP BY working_group_id;
steps.description: Retrieve the total completed quantity of all sewing tasks for each working group

steps.sql: SELECT working_group_id, SUM(planned_number) AS total_planned FROM sewing_tasks GROUP BY working_group_id;
steps.description: Retrieve the total planned quantity of all sewing tasks for each working group

steps.sql: SELECT wg.name, (total_completed / total_planned) * 100 AS progress_percentage FROM (SELECT working_group_id, SUM(completed_number) AS total_completed FROM sewing_tasks GROUP BY working_group_id) AS completed JOIN (SELECT working_group_id, SUM(planned_number) AS total_planned FROM sewing_tasks GROUP BY working_group_id) AS planned ON completed.working_group_id = planned.working_group_id JOIN working_group wg ON completed.working_group_id = wg.id WHERE wg.type = 'sew';
steps.description: Calculate the progress percentage for each sewing group by dividing the total completed quantity by the total planned quantity
